pkgmetadata.longdescription: # labtoolA tool to analyze lab report files# Installing```shell$ pip install labtool```# Usage```shell$ labtool --helpusage: labtool [-h] [-f {tab,csv,json}] [-o OUTPUT] [-v] [files ...]A tool to analyze compatible lab report files.positional arguments: files report files to analyze (PDF)optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -f {csv,json,tab}, --format {csv,json,tab} output format -o OUTPUT, --output OUTPUT output to file instead of console -v, --verbose show additional info```
